name: places/ChIJT4KWcYpZwokRLoxkiPRmHBc
adrFormatAddress: 233 Broadway #2020, New York, NY 10279, USA

originalText.text:
I cannot speak highly enough of the immigration law firm Claudia Slovinsky & Associates, particularly the exceptional services provided by lawyer Dominic Kong. Having worked with Dominic personally, I can confidently say that he is a true standout in his field. His competence, organizational skills, and dedication to his clients make him an outstanding immigration lawyer.
Dominic's expertise is beyond impressive. He navigated my  complex immigration process with an in-depth understanding and a meticulous attention to detail. Not only did he ensure that all the paperwork was in perfect order, but he also took the time to explain every step of the process.
What truly sets Dominic apart is his ability to connect with his clients on a personal level. He made me feel heard and understood, addressing all my concerns with patience and empathy.
Dominic has a remarkable track record of success, not only with my case but also with several of my family members who sought his assistance. I wholeheartedly believe that Dominic Kong may be one of the best immigration lawyers in the country. I cannot express my gratitude enough for his outstanding work and the support provided by Claudia Slovinsky & Associates as a whole.
